member.name: P:AXA.Framework.DataAccess.DataAccessBase.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the string used to open a SQL Server database.
member.returns: The connection string that includes the source database name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.

member.name: M:AXA.Framework.DataAccess.DataAccessBase.FillDataset(System.String,System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Adds or refreshes rows in the System.Data.DataSet to match those in the data source using the System.Data.DataSet name, and creates a System.Data.DataTable named "Table."
member.param: The Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to execute at the data source.
A value indicating how the System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText property is to be interpreted.
The parameters of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure.

member.name: T:AXA.Framework.DataAccess.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AXA.Framework.DataAccess.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AXA.Framework.DataAccess.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
